Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging â€” all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAYâ€¦ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
